attributes.action: Call on the police to investigate the fraudulent behaviour of ITV whilst stealing millions of pounds of our money through phone ins
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
If you or I, ordinary citizens took money from people with the promise of chance to win something which could never be won because the winner had already been decided, would we be able to just say "sorry"?

NO!, we would be investigated and arrested by the Police for fraud.

ITV cannot be allowed to get away with the totally dishonest behaviour it has played out on us, the innocent British public.

Signing this petition calls upon the Prime Minister to demand a police investigation into all the programme makers responsible for this theft of our money. And those guilty of misleading and committing this fraud to be tried in a court of law and pay the penalty.
